text: Tassos (Efstathios) Nikolaou Papadopoulos (; 7 January 1934 â€“ 12 December 2008)Former Cyprus President Tassos Papadopoulos has died ; Famagusta Gazette, 12 December 2008Cypriot ex-leader dies of cancer; BBC News Online, 12 December 2008 was a Cypriot politician. He served as the fifth President of the Republic of Cyprus from February 28, 2003 to February 28, 2008. Papadopoulos died on 12 December 2008 from a type of lung cancer in Nicosia, Cyprus, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Cyprus Elections & Politics Category:1934 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Cyprus Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Presidents of Cyprus Category:Nicosia Category:Presidents of the House of Representatives (Cyprus)
title: Tassos Papadopoulos
